description:
Merge translations
Merges translations. Output file name is calculated based on dirs merged
flag_input: Directory to merge, by default it will merge all translations in translations folder
example_mergeAllAndRemove:
# Merge all translations and remove source files
sfdx metadata:translations:merge -r
example_mergeOnlyOne:
# Merge only translations in one folder
sfdx metadata:translations:merge -i force-app/main/default/translations/pl
